basics.name: Chien Nguyen
basics.label: AI Engineer
basics.summary: I am an AI Engineer at AIMENEXT JSC, Vietnam. I graduated in Applied Mathematics and informatics from Hanoi University of Science and Technology in 2020."

education.institution: Hanoi University of Science and Technology
education.area: Applied Mathematics and Informatics, Talented Program (Highest Honours)

work.company: CÔNG TY CỔ PHẦN GIAO HÀNG TIẾT KIỆM
highlights: Maintained some components of eKYC system including (OCR system for identity card, driving license, ..., ReID system for face matching and searching, ...)
Researched, designed, implemented oriented object detection for measure size of package orders from post office for internal use.
Researched, designed, and implemented PoC for the customers' problem.

Researched, designed, and implemented semantic segmentation, object detection, change detection model to solve customers's problem like identify and analyze pupillary activity, identify objects in electrical circuit design drawings, detect differences in printing, ...
Researched, designed, and implemented OCR systems can handle and extract information from various types of contexts and documents like Identity card, document image, license plate in the wild.
Optimize and maintain pre-processing system for OCR problem (specifically the problem of rectify document images).
Designed, implemented and management system for collecting bank card payment data using Selenium library.
Mentor AI Engineer Intern in solving computer vision problem and deploying solutions via Flask-api.
Implemented and manage CVAT (a data labeling tool for deep learning problem).
Researched and implemented solutions for speaker diarization, speaker identification problem for building applications that automatically generate meeting notes.
Build financial models, test, simulate and track the effectiveness of models (alpha) using internal operators and data.
Researched and implemented solutions for speech processing and image processing problem.

work.position: Frontend Web Developer & Machine Learning Engineer Intern
highlights: Implemented a machine learning model for processing road from satellite images.

volunteer.position: Speaker count: A new building block for speaker diarization, in APSIPA 2021
